availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Roberts (Barren County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Drury Roberts and Lucy Roberts. Student in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Barren County in 1850. Farm laborer in Barren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 2, p. 442A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 2, p. 214.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 790.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #10711.
